summary: This bill, the "Saving Homeowners from Overregulation With Exceptional Rinsing Act" or "SHOWER Act," amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to revise the definition of "showerhead." It refers to the ASME A112.18.1–2024 standard and excludes safety shower showerheads. The Secretary of Energy is mandated to issue revised regulations within 180 days to align with the new definition.
